job_text: ['Partner deeply and influence business partners in marketing and customer-development teams to deliver meaningful data-led insights that would result in more impactful consumer-centric brand experience.', 'Drive and demonstrate value of current marketing analytics capabilities while also developing new solutions that directly impact business performance outcomes. Drives activation and adoption of these solutions to maximize and measure business value; ensures countries unlock business value of data', 'Be a part of the collaboration and innovation in the following teams and areas:', 'Regional and market eCommerce teams - Use cross-market and cross-region data and insights against their strategic eCommerce customer roadmap. Analysis of digital eCommerce data and marketing efforts from a variety of data sources (ARA, web analytics, SAP, etc.). Share meaningful insights on findings.', 'Produce deep-dive analysis of website features, advertising campaigns, social media, PR, Email, and organic search data to partners to ensure dynamic campaign optimization for a communications ecosystem that is connected to deliver a magnificent experience across shopper/consumer journey.', 'Designing data connectivity maps that enable measurement and analysis for coordinated E2E execution excellence. Core functions to collaborate with will be sales and marketing, IT.', 'Enable advanced segmentation analysis owned databases to build insights that lead to more impactful and cost-efficient CRM operations e.g., RFM in salesforce modeling).', 'Identify, wireframe, prototype, test, and operationalize analytic solutions analyzing the consumer ecosystem and connected commerce experience using data visualization platforms (e.g., Google data studio, Tableau, Excel, PowerBI).', 'Lead development and implementation of interactive dashboards/analysis tools to provide a holistic view of their business for business leaders and teams across the organization to enable rapid insights generation.', 'Evaluate and deploy simulation and forecasting methodologies to enable business scenario simulation and more efficient and effective plans.', 'Generate and deliver business insights and recommendations utilizing syndicated tools, programs and data.', 'Engage with Insights, IT, Customer, Supply Chain, Finance to build a global data repository of key business data, the fuel for insights generation.', 'Thought leadership with regard to the types of research and analyses that identify issues and meaningful recommendations relevant in driving business results.', 'Commercial Analytics: Drive sustainable revenue growth through the delivery and ongoing support of marketing mix modeling, marketing spend optimization, pricing, promotion, assortment simulation models and insights’ driven decision making.', 'Strong foundational background with commercial analytics essential (ie. CPG analytics, POS data, distribution and pricing metrics..)', '5 years of meaningful related experience with either CRM eCommerce (dealing with personal data) and/or Digital Analytics (ie: Google 360, Adobe digital analytics, SEO/SEM search) is crucial.', 'Ability to come up with creative strategies to target people with 1st and 2nd party customer data.', 'Experience and knowledgeable in consumer B2C marketing & retail.', 'Strong commerce experience using data visualization platforms (ie., Google data studio, Tableau, Excel, PowerBI).', 'University Degree in Business or related field is helpful.', 'High emotional IQ with track record in developing, leading, and influencing project teams to produce successful outcomes.', 'Good initiator with a natural curiosity of how things work and intuitive on "why"/"how" we can improve.', 'Strategic problem solver with big picture orientation who has ability to zoom in and zoom out', 'Engaging and influential written and verbal communication skills']

job_title: e-Discovery Programmer/Analyst (exp. w/ Data Management, SQL, Python), Remote/WFH USA
job_text: ['Job', 'Company', 'Servicing ad-hoc, urgent, custom data requests (reporting, data manipulation, remediation work, SQL queries) from CLCS clients on a 24/7/365 basis. Requests can come in from clients at any time and are prioritized in a queue-based client and litigation deadlines. The Programmer / Analysts on the team must be able to execute on these requests independently, quickly, and accurately. Typical requests are completed (from evaluation to completion) in 5-8 hours. Some requests may take longer while others may be shorter.', 'Supports internal ad-hoc automation efforts to improve the efficiency of CLCS operations more generally. This includes executing on shorter term quick-win development initiatives, research, new services and remediation projects.', 'CDS also acts as a e-Discovery/analytics consultant to the operation’s processing teams, project managers, and client services.', 'Some off-shift and weekend flexibility is required to meet client demands', 'Participation in team on-call rotation required for off-hours support.', 'BS Computer Science or equivalent degree required.', 'Must be a self-starter', 'Possess a solid understanding of the SDLC and be able to analyze user requirements, procedures, and problems to automate or improve existing systems.', 'Possess superb problem solving skills', 'Have a strong degree of intellectual curiosity, analytical skills and the ability to comprehend and master complex technical challenges.', 'Must have outstanding organization, communication and follow-through with a focus on customer service.', 'Prefer candidate to have three to five (3-5) years of experience in e-Discovery, including relevant working knowledge of at least one e-Discovery review platform (Relativity preferred)', 'Strong background in key technologies, including client/server environments, network technologies, databases and web-based technologies', 'Excellent communications skills (interpersonal, written and verbal)', 'A minimum of three (3) years of experience working in a Linux concepts, terminology and architecture', 'Extensive industry familiarity with implementation experience of popular BI packages such as Business Objects, MicroStrategy, Tableau, Qlikview and MS Power BI.', 'Must consent to, and successfully clear all required pre-employment screenings', 'Must be currently eligible to work for any employer in the United States', 'Flexibility and adaptability to adjust to a rapidly growing, dynamic environment', 'Strong work ethic – evening and weekend hours will be required', 'Ability to adhere to strict deadlines', 'Mentoring less experienced analysts in project development tasks', 'Identify and communicate timelines, deliverables and key milestones for assigned work requests', 'Provide technical guidance to both internal and external clients, ensuring the most-sound technical solutions are being offered.']

['Develops a data infrastructure across our organization that allows data to drive business and programmatic decision making.', 'Builds relationships across departments to understand user needs for data.', 'Creates, develops and maintains reports, datasets, ad hoc requests, dashboards, metrics, data generators, etc. for end-users using system tools and databases. Produce actionable reports that show key performance indicators, identify areas of improvement into current operations, and display root cause analysis of problems.', 'Analyzes and determines data needs for end-users. Accesses, extracts and integrates data from diverse sources residing on multiple platforms and implement data models by combining, synthesizing and structuring data.', 'Conduct data analysis and capture, develop and document data definitions, business rules and data quality requirements.', 'Ensure data integrity, consistency and reliability by implementing quality assurance practices; performs quality data audits and analysis. Identify areas of improvement in data collection processes or systems and make recommendations to correct deficiencies.', 'As a subject matter expert, utilizes analytical tools to perform quantitative analysis. Interpret data, analyze results, and identifies key data insights to address specific business questions and highlights findings and implications of analysis to The Family Institute’s stakeholders.', 'Provides quantitative and qualitative data analysis and reporting of patterns, insights and trends to decision-makers in order to drive business decisions and address business questions.', 'Summarizes analysis into user-friendly deliverables by translating detailed data into business-appropriate communication and recommendations.', 'Applies new perspectives, creative problem solving and inter-departmental connections to improve analytical capabilities.', 'Takes initiatives to design and develop deliverables based on interpretation of findings and business client needs on a wide range of analytical topics.', 'Creates and is accountable for high quality, value driven work that drives business outcomes and data driven decisions.', 'Bachelor’s degree required; emphasis in Mathematics, Statistics, Information Technology or Healthcare Technology. A strong understanding and management of healthcare related applications and data is a plus.', 'Proven experience, ideally in healthcare, with granular data analysis, predictive analytics or analytics technology products. Hands-on experience reading/writing code in a data analyst role.', 'Fluency in SQL or other similar programming languages. Some development experience in at least one scripting language (Python, R, etc.) is a plus.', 'Experience with data visualization and tools such as SPSS, SASS and PowerBI.', 'Experience launching internal metric dashboards and scorecards. You are a data-storyteller who is comfortable communicating results in a crisp and effective manner to all audiences (technical and non-technical).', 'Strong analytical skills and can evangelize the use of data for sound decision making across functions. Strong oral and written communication skills, and ability to collaborate with, and influence cross-functional partners.', 'Self-motivated, self-directed and able to thrive in a fast-paced environment in an industry that constantly changes.', 'A mindset of designing for the future but building for now. An eagerness to learn from others and help others grow with you. A love of data and finding interesting questions to ask of it.']

['You’re a born leader: You are a self-starter who can lead and influence stakeholders to resolve day to day challenges without waiting for someone to solve the problem for you. You seek to move quickly and introduce new ideas, make decision that account for risk, knowing they may not be perfect, and are willing to learn from feedback or flaws.', 'You’re a strategy guru: In addition to managing projects, you will validate strategies and footprint changes for the network. You can take a 6 – 12 months forecast and strategically review network capacity to develop a level loaded analysis which will deliver a clear picture of the network for all functions. It is not only about today; we need to be prepared for tomorrow and the future.', 'You’re a dot connector: You will be a strong link to connecting our 3PLs to our key support functions (Customer Service, Logistics, Warehousing, and Planning) to ensure the all functions are aligned on footprint changes. You will be responsible for projecting out network capacity concerns, developing analytical tools for new acquisitions and finding continuous improvement opportunities with the Planning teams', 'You’re a changemaker: You will be a change agent for our Unilever supply chain. You will need a firm hand and a strong will, while being calm under pressure. Be cooperative. Be a team player and a positive influence at work.']

job_title: Manager of Strategic Revenue Management - Commercial
job_text: ['The SRM position will play a crucial role in aligning in-depth expertise of the SRM levers with deep commercial experience, translating how each SRM lever individually and in aggregate supports different Division and Channels/Customer teams to help them achieve their business goals. The role will be responsible for:', 'Support Execution of SRM deployment in the organization with thorough understanding of landscape, opportunities and trendsWork with division leaders, accounts and targets to SRM vision', 'Support development of Strategic Pricing capabilities across the organization:Drive multi-lens market analyses for pricing opportunity identification and impact curves, elasticities)', 'Support the definition and execution of Price-Pack Architecture across the organization:Support definition and execution of optimized Pack Price architecture (right pack at the right price in the right channel & ensuring profit expectations of both Nestlé & customer are satisfied) through fully understanding consumer, shopper & customer needs across prioritized channelsContinually monitor for PPA optimization opportunitiesSupport deep dive into the business, using analytics to uncover growth opportunities and refined competitive positioning, including pricing opportunities, pack size opportunities, to help NUSA win in our current categories', 'Define and execute Mix & Assortment across the organization:Support and drive choices about which parts of our portfolio to drive in which channels/customers to win profitable share and growth', 'Be the point of contact between SRM and Finance / Sales Finance:Support track and measure financial impact of day to day execution in the field', 'Have deep understanding on the business drivers and KPIs and how they the SRM levers directly or indirectly impacts them', 'Influence multiple stakeholders in a job_title: Operational Risk Reporting and Analysis Manager - AVP
job_text: ['Job', 'Company', 'Prepare regular, ad-hoc and time-sensitive analytics, visualizations and reports to the risk managers, senior management, and regulators, with close collaboration with risk managers in the area of expertise.', 'Centrally acquire all data related to Operational Risk while ensuring data quality, completeness, consistency and timeliness of the end results.', 'Develop expertise in the specific risk management area, including risk metrics, risk governance, as well as related data and technology infrastructure.', 'Leverage risk and technical expertise to increase the information value of the content with actionable insights for management.', 'Drive process improvement opportunities that enhance the efficiency of the production process.', "Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding Citigroup, its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and reporting control issues with transparency.", 'Bachelor’s or master’s degree in science, engineering; or finance, economics; or related analytical fields', '2-5 years of relevant work experience', 'Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Office: Excel, Access, Power Point and Word', 'Skills in data, analytics, databases, data quality are desired; experience in Tableau, PowerBI, visualization is preferred', 'Coding experience in Python, R, SAS, Stata (or related statistics packages) with complex data is helpful', 'Knowledge of and interests in finance, markets, risk management', 'Strong team player with excellent work ethics, attention to details and accuracy', 'Quick learner with strong communication, organizational & interpersonal skills with the ability to work with counterparts in various areas in the organization.']

['Support the geoscience information system landscape;', 'Develop and support exploration and mining operations geology systems;', 'Work closely with the Geoscience Information Manager to identify and take advantage of opportunities to optimise the effectiveness and efficiency of the business process;', 'Support the identification and development of automated solutions to improve efficiencies and value-added benefits;', 'Collaborate closely with the Data Services team to deliver on set tasks in a timely manner;', 'Proactively seek out and provide suitable solutions to remedy technical and workflow related issues;', 'Identify potential ML/AI applications in exploration, assist discipline experts with development (where applicable), implementation and adoption;', 'Work closely with the operational teams to optimise mining geology and geometallurgical processes to provide solutions that take advantage of ML/AI technologies;', 'Assist in evaluating proposals and collaborating in active projects with start-ups and research groups in topics related to data science in exploration and mining technology;;', 'Keep abreast of the latest technologies within cloud computing and relational databases to ensure that AngloGold Ashanti can provide efficient exploration and mining geology services to the Growth and Exploration group and operations;', 'Build business partnerships and maintain strong working relationships with key stakeholders across AGA;', 'Confidently present ideas, results and recommendations to a variety of stakeholders;', 'Provide mentorship and training for teams across AGA.', 'Travel to relevant sites and regional offices as required to fulfil the duties and responsibilities of the role;', 'Demonstrate behaviour that is consistent with the AGA Vision and Values.', 'MSc or PhD degree in a relevant field with machine learning and data mining OR minimum of 4+ years’ experience in a similar role; Geoscience knowledge highly desirable.', 'Knowledge of mining and mineral processing activities and workflows ;', 'Knowledge of mining geology and geometallurgy across areas such as material fingerprinting, mine to mill material tracking, stockpile reconciliation and metal accounting is desirable;', 'Experience in identifying and developing ML/AI applications and with the implementation and adoption of applications;', 'Proven experience programming in SQL, R and Python;', 'Experience in Microsoft tools including PowerBI, PowerApps, Power Automate and Azure cloud;', 'Literacy in data management principles and quality control systems.', 'Self-motivation, be well organised with attention to detail. Flexibility with regard to challenging tasks and assignment priorities is necessary;', 'A “service oriented” attitude and a work commitment to ensure allocated tasks are completed in a timely manner, particularly with respect to company reporting and presentation requirements.', 'P roven ability to work constructively and collaboratively in a team;', 'Ability to work efficiently and independently with an eye for detail and quality outcomes;', 'Ability to work to strict deadlines and work well under pressure.', 'Willingness to travel to relevant sites and regional offices as required', 'Eligibility for working rights in the most appropriate AGA location for the role (Perth, Denver or Johannesburg), based on successful applicant’s situation and company requirements.']

job_title: Azure DevOps Engineer with Hadoop Data
job_text: ['Experience of IT service business and engineering of multi-year managed services', 'From 10-15 years plus of demonstrable enterprise level IT delivery experience', 'Cloud (5 years) in an engineering role using service and hosting solutions such as private/public cloud IaaS, PaaS and SaaS platforms. Nice to have Experience with any of the following: Azure, Azure Stack, Azure AD', 'Scripting (5 years) – having knowledge and experience with Microsoft PowerShell (required) and Linux shell scripting (preferred). Being able to understand and use best practices of completing tasks and finding solutions using existing or building new scripts to help automate today’s manual infrastructure and application tasks.', 'Functional knowledge of programming scripting and data science languages such as JavaScript, PowerShell, Python, Bash, SQL, .NET, Java, PHP, Ruby, PERL, C++, R, etc.', 'Understanding of CI/CD delivery using code management, configuration management and automation tools such as GitHub, VSTS, Ansible, DSC, Puppet, Ambari, Chef, Salt, Jenkins, Maven, etc.', 'Configuration Management (3 years) – being able to develop recipes for new solutions to deploy consistent systems, enforce configurations and settings through configuration management systems like PowerShell DSC, Chef or Puppet.', 'Tools & Environment: Hadoop Cloudera Manager, Hadoop Stack (Hive, Ranger, Atlas, Spark, NiFi, Impala), SQL Server 2012/2016, PowerBi Suite, Tableau.', 'Experience setting up a Hadoop Cluster environment, administrating including adding and removing cluster nodes, cluster capacity planning and performance tuning. Experience in running Hadoop jobs for processing multiple records of data, monitoring and sizing clusters, developing Hive queries to perform data analysis for large datasets and supporting various Solution Teams providing guidance around data quality and integrity.', 'Networking (1-3 years) - Have a solid understanding of networking capabilities, including load balancers, web application firewalls, network access control lists (NACLs), security groups, routing, tracing, DNS resolution are key to building efficient and stable solutions that prevent business downtime and provide high availability capabilities.', 'Documentation (2-3 years) - Being able to create technical documents that provide insight into the design and implementation of a solution provides teams with the ability to effectively communicate their needs and requirements across the organization. The candidate has to be able to produce clear and concise architecture and design documentation that can assist his team and other peer groups in understanding of the built solutions. The candidate must also be able to communicate complex technical issues with sensitivity to diverse audiences and people with different level of technical understanding that range from entry level support teams, management, and technical engineering resources.', 'Operational Support awareness (5 years) – A good understanding of what it takes to support the deployed applications and solutions is key to providing great service to the end users. The candidate has to be able to put themselves into a position of understanding of their consumer pain points to be able to figure out creative ways not only to find quick workarounds but also analyze the root cause of the problem and come up with ideas of resolving them in the long term.', 'Source code management (3 years) – Familiarity with source control tools such as Git, Team Foundation Server (TFVC), and SVN are a big part of automation and compliance. job_title: Director, IT Business Relationship- Hog Production & Innovation
job_text: ['Job', 'Company', 'Overall responsibility for serving as the strategic interface with assigned business units for the purpose of business/IT strategy development, solution discovery, service management, risk management and relationship management across the globe.', 'Serve as the business relationship linkage between the various Hog Production business departments and IT, at multiple levels including the Executive level.', 'Serve as the single escalation point for the Executive Team within Hog Production.', 'Bring IT innovation to all areas of Hog Production including the Feed and Livestock Supply Chain process.', 'Manage the portfolio and be the key product champion for applications that promote the business objectives of Hog Production.', 'Communicate decisions, priorities and relevant project information to appropriate levels of staff regarding business unit requests, projects and initiatives.', 'Proactively identify opportunities to leverage technology, create business values or reduce production costs.', 'Focus on strategic initiatives and plans that are proactive, anticipatory, driving in nature and provide significant value to business units.', 'Facilitate the planning and execution of business changes through the use of technology.', 'Manage business relationships and projects across teams, vendors and 3rd party providers.', 'Oversee the prioritization and delivery of solutions for area(s) of ownership ensuring value realization.', 'Collaborate with the business to define the strategy for integrating/combining systems by providing a technology perspective, influencing and ensuring alignment of IT strategy with business strategy within the sub-function or region.', 'Perform research, support pilots, and investigate potential solutions to help anticipate the business needs and communicate solution recommendations that support business requirements to business partners.', 'Participate in identifying, assessing, and promoting the use of new technologies for increased productivity or new capabilities for the business.', 'Drive technology and business process innovation within and across the global organization ensuring continuity and manages a portfolio of services to address business needs within a sub-function or region.', "Bachelor's Degree from a regionally accredited four-year college or university in Information Technology or related field and 10+ years of IT experience; or equivalent combination of education and experience, required.", '12+ years of experience in progressive IT roles, preferred.', 'Minimum of 8+ years of experience in an IT project leadership role with specific emphasis and deep working knowledge and experience in effective project management, ITL or similar methodology.', 'Working experience and knowledge of JD Edwards, PowerBI and SAP Business Analytics required', 'Broad business applications experience preferably in the Hog Production and Agribusiness', 'Significant experience working with senior business leaders and C-suite executives on developing strategies to leverage technology to drive business value', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills with ability to effectively communicate with peers and executive leadership.', 'Strong leadership and management skills, including facilitating change, driving operational excellence, and striving for continuous improvement.', 'Ability to translate business needs to solutions', 'Technical aptitude to understand and apply technology solutions to support business change', 'Conversant and abreast of the latest technological advances (RPA, AI, Machine Learnings, OCR, etc.) in the relevant line of business areas', 'Working knowledge of the most current planning and S&OP tools/software', 'Experience with business process optimization methodologies & approaches', 'Proven project management experience working with mid-sized to large projects', 'People management and development experience', 'Ability to lead and manage under conditions of ambiguity and uncertainty.', 'Proven organizational skills in working across organizational boundaries and reporting lines.', 'Strong communications, influencing and partnering skills', 'Ability to work with Vendors and Corporate partners on delivery execution and providing cost effective- high quality solutions', 'Ability to work well with others in fast paced, dynamic environment.', 'Ability to be respectful, approachable and team oriented while building strong working relationships and a positive work environment.', 'Role will be responsible for managing Business Relationship Managers, contractors and outside vendors as business needs arise.', 'Provides leadership and guidance to employees within IT', "Carries out supervisory responsibilities in accordance with the organization's policies and applicable laws.", 'Responsibilities include interviewing, hiring, and training employees; planning, assigning, and directing work; appraising performance; rewarding and disciplining employees; addressing complaints and assisting in providing appropriate resolutions.']

['Looks ahead and plans technical advances for future growth in enterprises/expansion. Utilizes deep knowledge and experience in enterprise-wide platforms to solve complex technical problems.', 'Researches new data platforms and technologies, performs POCs, provides recommendations and design specifications for implementations as appropriate for the business.', 'Configures, maintains, monitors, and optimizes data platforms/services and pipelines on Azure Cloud infrastructure.', 'Uses Azure services such as Azure SQL DW (Synapse), ADLS, Azure Event Hub, Azure Data Factory to improve and speed up delivery of our data products and services.', 'Seeks opportunities to learn, automate, document, share, educate, and improve processes where appropriate.', 'Provides a senior escalation point for complex issues. Ensures timely recovery from outages, performs root cause analysis, and implements preventative measures.', 'Utilizes Agile DevOps methodologies where appropriate.', 'Provides mentoring to team members, disseminating information through documentation, workshops, and any other appropriate channels, to drive operational efficiencies and technical growth within the team.', 'Provides 24x7x365 on-call support, weekends and/or holidays, as necessary.', 'Understands and adheres to Costco’s Mission Statement and Code of Ethics.', '5+ years’ IT experience.', '3+ years’ experience using Azure Services: Azure SQL DW (Synapse), ADLS, Azure Event Hub, Azure Data Factory, Azure Search, etc.).', '3+ years’ experience using Databricks and/or Spark clusters for data processing.', '5+ years’ experience building, maintaining, and monitoring data pipelines (real time & batch).', '5+ years’ experience working with relational databases, and SQL.', '5+ years’ experience with Data Modeling, ETL, and Data Warehousing.', 'Azure certification(s).', 'Experience with Databrick’s Delta Lake.', 'Experience with multiple coding languages (Python, Spark, Scala, R, Java, etc.).', 'Experience with automation tools: Azure DevOps, Terraform, puppet, ansible, etc.', 'Experience with Reporting Tools (PowerBI, Tableau, Alteryx, Sisense).', 'Knowledge of Information Security best practices and principles (certificates, encryption, etc.).', 'Knowledge of BigData (HDFS/Hadoop).', 'Knowledge of Agile/DevOps Methodologies (Scrum, kanban).', 'Cover Letter', 'Resume']

job_text: ['Job', 'Company', 'Work closely with stakeholder groups to define requirements, design appropriate BI solutions, and implement applications against development standards and best practices', 'Able to convey complex technical concepts to both peers and stakeholders', 'Attention to detail and a keen eye for evaluating financial reporting against expected results', 'Demonstrate a love of all things relating to P&L reporting', 'Strong business acumen and an ability to engage functional peers on core business strategies', 'Provide timely and accurate estimates of development Levels of Effort (LOE) and appropriate status updates', 'Work closely with peers in cross functional groups and independently on projects as necessary', 'Comfortable engaging with Finance resources and IT resources', 'Work closely with management to ensure adherence to best practices and scheduled code release cycles', 'Dedicated to keeping code checked in to the teams code repository', 'This is an experienced role requiring typically 6+ years of BI development experience', "Bachelor's Degree or equivalent education and/or experience preferred", 'Experience working within a full BI technology stack (data, ETL, back-end, and reporting)', 'Excellent SQL skills that will be tested to their limit on a daily basis', 'Experience with visual reporting and best practices for tools such as Tableau, PowerBI, QlikView, Business Objects, etc.', 'Microsoft BI stack experience (SSIS, SQL Server, SSRS, SSAS)', 'Experience working in a complex data environment with rapidly changing requirements', 'Experience with physical and logical data modeling strongly preferred', 'Strong testing and debugging skills', 'Experience with JSON and REST services a plus', 'Prior exposure to cloud base data warehousing technologies preferred', 'Development experience in Hadoop or NoSQL environments a plus', 'Familiarity with SDLC principals and with Agile and DevOps methodologies']

['Initial and ongoing training of the FO for PWM technologies (SF & PBI initial tools).', 'Serve as the initial support destination for SF and PBI & partner with dedicated IT product owners', 'for support escalations.', 'Maintain a strong working knowledge of Salesforce, Power BI, related platforms and technologies.', 'Communicate with advisors and provide a consultative approach to identify problems and create long-term solutions.', 'Proactively work with teams to understand current usage and foster adoption of technologies with a focus on best practices across PWM.', 'Collaborate with FO, IT & Middle Office to enrich and maintain Salesforce data.', 'Document functionality/workflow enhancements and Liaison between FO & IT.', 'Foster a collaborative environment between the Front Office, Platform Adoption Team and IT', 'Ensure work activities follow established risk controls and are in compliance with applicable rules,', 'regulations, policies and procedures.', 'Additional responsibilities as requested.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Finance or related subject matter required; MBA preferred', '5+ years of experience in financial services required', '5+ years experience working with Salesforce.com, PowerBI or other related', 'platforms preferred', 'Solid understanding of Excel (vlookup, Pivot Tables, Conditional Formatting)', 'Strong project management and prioritization skills – deadline driven role', 'Ability to collaborate across multiple functions', 'Attention to detail and quality', 'Knowledge of trading operations', 'Customer service oriented', 'Strong proficiency in data management, including data cleanup initiatives', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills', 'Strong problem resolution skills and data management skills', 'Ability to work effectively in a team environment', 'Proficiency in Microsoft Office']

['Financial Analysis – Using various financial modeling methods, provide financial analysis for business decisions and investment opportunities. Update, develop, and improve costing/pricing and detailed product cost-to-build models, including working with other departments to gather relevant inputs and supporting product transition plans, to drive margin improvement to support forecast assumptions. Prepare insightful management reporting packages for business units and executive management.', 'Financial Reporting and Controls – Safeguard that accounting is in accordance to accounting practices by escalating atypical transactions for review by Accounting and providing sound advice. Prepare open PO accruals and participate in monthly close, including review and explanation of results. Recommend, implement, and improve regular reporting and financial processes to help effectively manage budgets and control costs.', 'Forecasting and Strategic Planning – Coordinate and prepare rolling forecast and strategic planning scenarios that meet business unit and overall corporate needs to support financial outlook and strategic initiatives. Using financial trending and other methods of analysis, provide guidance and advice to improve forecasting and reporting accuracy, improve results, and identify areas of risk.', 'Business Partnering – Interact regularly with senior management to support needs and help drive improvements. Anticipate needs and respond to requests in a manner that demonstrates a depth of knowledge of the business, meets the needs of the user, and provides additional financial insight beyond the initial ask. Contribute ideas that improve profitability for the company.', 'Corporate Reporting and Support - Support various corporate reporting, forecasting, analysis, and process improvement projects as assigned. This includes corporate margin forecasting and analysis, preparation of Board materials, and other analysis/projects reviewed with the CFO and other executives. Foster collaboration and partner with others within the Finance team to leverage expertise and work content. Solve business unit needs with an eye towards how to efficiency grow the solution to be available corporate-wide.', 'Reporting Systems – Participate in the design, development, and on-going maintenance of models, databases, and hierarchies to improve accuracy, usability, and availability of data within Corporate reporting systems.', 'Master’s Degree and/or relevant certification preferred, with focus on finance', '10+ years’ related experience, ideally in high tech or semiconductor manufacturing', 'MS Excel power-user and general computer system aptitude. Experience creating dashboard reporting (PowerBI experience a plus) and using PowerPoint', 'Experience utilizing various ERP systems (MS Dynamics AX particularly helpful)', 'Team player with well-developed interpersonal, communication, and presentation skills', 'Creative and tenacious problem-solver with strong analytical skills', 'Ability to organize, manage, and timely deliver on multiple high-priority projects simultaneously', 'To meet security and export control regulations, this position requires either U.S. Citizenship or U.S. Permanent Resident Alien Status.']

job_text: ['The SRM position will play a crucial role in aligning in-depth expertise of the SRM levers with deep commercial experience, translating how each SRM lever individually and in aggregate supports different Division and Channels/Customer teams to help them achieve their business goals. job_title: Vice President - IT Resilience & Continuity Officer
job_text: ['Contribute to the identification and recommendations to mitigate business and system disruption risks before they occur', 'Maintain oversight for and respond to disruptive events (realized risks) in a manner that demonstrates 2LoD oversight of IT Infrastructure Risks (Network, Data Centre, Storage, Backup etc.) and IT Service Management risks (Incident Management, Problem Management, Change Management, Capacity Management etc.)', 'Monitor and maintain 2LoD command and control during business and IT disruptions and crises, across a variety of resilience scenarios', 'Recover and restore mission-critical services and operations following an incident within the agreed risk appetite levels set by management', 'Contribute to the overall enhancement in Operational Resilience of CIB Americas and IHC in coordination and consultation with RISK ORC ICT and RISK ORC leadership', 'Provide 2LoD oversight through appropriate risk anticipation, assessments and check & challenge of IT Resilience focusing on IT Infrastructure and IT Service Management risks (including in evolving domains such as Enterprise Cloud)', 'Collaborate with 1LoD and 2LoD specialists to reduce Cloud risks:', 'Perform architectural and deployment reviews to minimize single points of failures and catastrophic IT incidents', 'Engage on known or emerging security and IT risks for Cloud services by initiating or influencing the development of new platform / security architectures and compliance with architectural principles and objectives', 'Application of DevSecOps architecture and solutions for design for securing compute services, patch management, data security, network security, regulations and compliance requirements.', 'Contribute to the check & challenge of the overall resilience readiness for CIB Americas and focus on the alignment and integration of IT Continuity risks within the overall Business Continuity Risks for the bank', 'Participate in IT risk and architecture working groups and collaborate with key stakeholders in RISK ORC and RISK ORC ICT to independently identify, assess, mitigate report and escalate material ICT risks as appropriate.', 'Technically challenge the comprehensiveness of testing arrangements in line with regulatory as well as internal policy requirements', 'Actively contribute to the development of 2LoD policies, standards and procedures and contribute to the review and challenge of 1LoD policies, standards and procedures related to the assigned disciplines.', 'Perform regular and ongoing monitoring of incidents and produce high quality analysis fit for management consumption.', 'Assist with developing independent Risk opinion on local or regional incidents and to highlight key control deficiencies', 'Perform thematic reviews and deep dives on specific programs and projects aimed at improving the IT platform stability and resilience of CIB Americas', 'Work with cross-functional leadership teams in RISK ORC and RISK ORC ICT and contribute to 2LoD oversight during IT and business disruptions and crises - Provide subject matter expertise during response to local or regional crisis events', 'Contribute to 2LoD engagement and response, including in assisting enhanced reporting to management or to regulators', 'Assist in providing active advisory, partnership, challenge or approval to applicable risk owners to ensure appropriate prioritization and resolution of regulatory or IG findings and related actions', 'Contribute to the planning and development of 2LoD independent crisis management exercises, doing independent research on IT and Cyber threats and recommending suitable storyline, scenarios and designing injects, working alongside several other contributors in the process', 'Contribute to the overall design, development and specification of new/redesigned projects, processes, systems, information, risk controls, testing regimes, documentation and supporting materials.', 'Manage key stakeholders that will allow in the efficient execution of own responsibilities - establish and maintain ongoing collaborative relationships within CIB Americas and IHC 2LoD and 1LoD partners.', job_title: Manager of Strategic Revenue Management - Commercial
job_text: ['The SRM position will play a crucial role in aligning in-depth expertise of the SRM levers with deep commercial experience, translating how each SRM lever individually and in aggregate supports different Division and Channels/Customer teams to help them achieve their business goals. The role will be responsible for:', 'Support Execution of SRM deployment in the organization with thorough understanding of landscape, opportunities and trendsWork with division leaders, accounts and brands to identify profitable initiatives and opportunitiesUnderstand the impact decisions will have on the commercial landscapeSteadily discipline and drive cultural change towards SRM capabilityCreate and actively drive the brand plans to embed SRM enablers (data, systems, process, capabilities) collaboration with Subject Matter Experts', 'Continuously evolve, develop, build and share SRM best practices for Strategic Pricing, PPA, and Assortment & Mix across the organizationConduct thorough analysis and synthesize insights into actionable recommendationsMonitor current execution of SRM practices to refresh feedback loop and evolutionSupport plans and drive stakeholder management to standardize SRM practices across the organizationSupport alignment of business targets to SRM vision', 'Support development of Strategic Pricing capabilities across the organization:Drive multi-lens market analyses for pricing opportunity identification and impact estimationSupport identification of pricing opportunities and develop pricing scenarios with Brand/Sales to optimize pricing architectureSupport recommendations on Pricing per channel/customer and improvements to deliver agreed upon targets, as well as driving the SRM enablers (data, system, process and capabilities) agendaMonitors pricing executionDevelop deep understanding of pricing (slope, curves, elasticities)', 'Support the definition and execution of Price-Pack Architecture across the organization:Support definition and execution of optimized Pack Price architecture (right pack at the right price in the right channel & ensuring profit expectations of both Nestlé & customer are satisfied) through fully understanding consumer, shopper & customer needs across prioritized channelsContinually monitor for PPA optimization opportunitiesSupport deep dive into the business, using analytics to uncover growth opportunities and refined competitive positioning, including pricing opportunities, pack size opportunities, to help NUSA win in our current categories', 'Define and execute Mix & Assortment across the organization:Support and drive choices about which parts of our portfolio to drive in which channels/customers to win profitable share and growth', 'Be the point of contact between SRM and Finance / Sales Finance:Support track and measure financial impact of SRM initiativesProvide deep understanding of SRM levers and the impact on the different P&L linesContinuous interaction with Sales Finance to ensure alignment of SRM ambitions and insights with the day to day execution in the field', 'Have deep understanding on the business drivers and KPIs and how they the SRM levers directly or indirectly impacts them', 'Influence multiple stakeholders in a cross-functional environment, requiring strong negotiation skills', 'Provide holistic, end-to-end view of the challenges and opportunities to implement and improve the SRM levers in the organization', 'Own driving a culture of consistent and sustained profitable growth', 'Be a driven self-starter, identifying opportunities and being accountable for the execution of the initiatives', '6 years of Business experience preferred, experience in the Consumer Packaged Goods industry a plus', '2+ years related Strategic Pricing experience preferred', 'MBA/post graduate education a plus but not required', 'Strong track record in analytic or commercial sales/marketing roles, commercial acumen is key', 'Drives confidence and momentum by providing the context and data / insights for others to think, decide and act', 'Understanding of one or more of: tool development, syndicated data, promotional effectiveness, sales finance', 'Familiarity with multiple data sources e.g. syndicated sales data, financial data, and consumer data', 'Experience with Excel, Access, SAP, Azure, SQL, Visualization Software (PowerBI experience preferred) to solve business problems', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills across functions; collaborating with brand/category teams and other key internal/external stakeholders; effective in influencing wide variety of stakeholders', 'Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Office (Excel and PowerPoint) and systems aptitude', 'Need commercial experience (finance and/or sales) to guide internal conversations with sales/finance and external conversations with distributors/retailers', 'Need to understand end-to-end processes of planning to execution, including navigation of systems landscape', 'Understanding of financial concepts and pricings (cash flow, NPV, IRR, ROI, economic profit, etc.)', 'Change Management in complex business environment', 'This role requires robust stakeholder management and negotiation skills, responsible for making decisions around margin management', 'Understands the impact decisions will have on commercial landscape across the NUSA organization', 'Analytical thought partner who can determine which data is relevant to create actionable and measurable insights']

Certification', 'Experience with evaluation and interpretation of engineering / design products (drawings, system diagrams, etc.) and specifications (material, product performance, dimensional control, etc.) in heavy industrial multiple trade discipline production process applications (welding, machining, pipe fitting, electrical, coatings, insulation, and structural fabrication/erection).', 'Proficiency with development and use of intermediate level Microsoft Applications (Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Access, Project, Power BI).', 'Working knowledge of government contract acquisition regulations preferred.', 'Itemizes tools, fixtures, or equipment to be manufactured by company or purchased from outside sources.', 'Develops estimates for cost of materials, purchased equipment, subcontracted work, production activities and requirements, and labor.', 'Experience identifying labor, tooling, and raw material requirements necessary to produce finished products in different shipbuilding and ship repair applications (shops, intermediate assembly areas, and aboard ships).', 'Development and documentation of cost estimating relationships describing interactions between independent variables (materials and manufacturing processes) and dependent variables (costs and schedule durations).']

job_title: Remote EPIC Manager Business Intelligence & Analytics
job_text: ['Requires a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field (CS, MIS or DSS degree preferred). Graduate degree in a related field is desired.', 'Must have a minimum of seven (7) years of progressively responsible SQL development, data modeling and/or business intelligence experience that demonstrates a strong understanding of the required knowledge, skills, and abilities. Experience managing multiple projects with increasing difficulty and complexity strongly preferred.', 'Requires prior direct or indirect supervisory/management experience preferably in a healthcare IT environment.', 'Epic systems training is preferred.', 'Project Management Professional (PMP) certification is preferred.', 'Must have an in-depth and broad range knowledge of Epic applications in both inpatient and outpatient settings.', 'Knowledge of relational and non-relational DBMS engines is required.', 'Must have knowledge of multiple Epic data models and a broad understanding of multiple BI, analytics and reporting tools.', 'Hands-on SQL development and data modeling.', 'Experience analyzing complex data, managing multiple projects with increasing difficulty and complexity, and developing sophisticated reports.', 'Certification in at least one Epic Cogito Data Model.', 'Deep expertise in complex modeling and analytical methodology.', 'Experience with statistical software tools such as SAS, Stata, or SPSS.', 'Advanced fluency with Microsoft Excel for data manipulation, analysis, and charting.', 'Experience with data visualization platforms such as Tableau, Qlik, PowerBI, and emerging advanced analytics platforms.', 'Experience with advanced analytic techniques, such as multivariate regression analysis, logistic regression, factor analysis, response prediction and ROI measurement.', 'Strong experience with data manipulation and analyzing large volumes of data. Solid understanding of database principles and efficiencies.', 'Must be a successful leader of people, have strong leadership skills and the ability to motivate a team.', 'Must have the ability to supervise and coordinate the work of subordinate personnel in a manner conducive to full performance and high morale.', 'Must be approachable, people oriented, and a good listener.', 'Must be a change agent able to develop, implement and maintain policies and processes.', 'Requires the ability to be a creative, independent thinker.', 'Must exhibit a high degree of professionalism, customer service, and enthusiasm, combined with the ability to build relationships with business and key stakeholders.', 'Must possess solid analytical and problem-solving skills along with the ability to utilize the appropriate management techniques to plan, organize, control and coordinate activities.', 'Must be able to manage priorities in a dynamic environment and adapt to change quickly and positively.', 'Requires the ability to read, write and speak effectively in English.']

['Leverage enterprise business intelligence tools, including SQL, statistical programming tools such as R / Python, and other tools to develop advanced reporting and analytics solutions.', 'Perform quantitative as well as statistical predictive analytics to develop solutions that would result in actionable recommendations and tools to support management decision making.', 'Develop subject matter expertise in the HelioCampus data platform and guide stakeholders in the use of the platform to answer strategic institutional questions.', 'Complete data validation and facilitate end user testing on designed reports and dashboards.', 'Bachelor’s degree with four years of experience or Master’s degree with two years of experience from an accredited institution of higher learning;', 'Experience working in data analytics and predictive modeling in higher education or related industry;', 'Significant experience working with relational databases;', 'Strong knowledge of SQL, R/ Python queries to build reports and answer ad hoc questions;', 'Expertise leveraging data visualization BI tools such as Excel, Tableau, PowerBI to manipulate, analyze and present data;', 'Excellent communication skills and experience presenting findings to mid to senior level executives;', 'Ability to work effectively on multiple priorities with strict deliverable dates;', 'Experience working closely with both business users and technical development teams.', 'Prior positions in higher education consulting or working with educational data;', 'Significant experience building reports and dashboards in Tableau;', 'Experience working with SIS, HR, CRM, Financial, ERP and Learning Management systems data;', 'Knowledge of PeopleSoft Campus Solutions, Banner Student, Workday Financials and HCM. job_title: Azure DevOps Engineer with Hadoop Data
job_text: ['Experience of IT service business and engineering of multi-year managed services', 'From 10-15 years plus of demonstrable enterprise level IT delivery experience', 'Cloud (5 years) in an engineering role using service and hosting solutions such as private/public cloud IaaS, PaaS and SaaS platforms. Experience in engineer technical solutions for Microsoft-centric solutions based on industry standards using Azure or other cloud providers IaaS, PaaS and SaaS capabilities. Nice to have Experience with any of the following: Azure, Azure Stack, Azure AD', 'Scripting (5 years) – having knowledge and experience with Microsoft PowerShell (required) and Linux shell scripting (preferred). Being able to understand and use best practices of completing tasks and finding solutions using existing or building new scripts to help automate today’s manual infrastructure and application tasks.', 'Functional knowledge of programming scripting and data science languages such as JavaScript, PowerShell, Python, Bash, SQL, .NET, Java, PHP, Ruby, PERL, C++, R, etc.', 'Understanding of CI/CD delivery using code management, configuration management and automation tools such as GitHub, VSTS, Ansible, DSC, Puppet, Ambari, Chef, Salt, Jenkins, Maven, etc.', 'Configuration Management (3 years) – being able to develop recipes for new solutions to deploy consistent systems, enforce configurations and settings through configuration management systems like PowerShell DSC, Chef or Puppet.', 'Tools & Environment: Hadoop Cloudera Manager, Hadoop Stack (Hive, Ranger, Atlas, Spark, NiFi, Impala), SQL Server 2012/2016, PowerBi Suite, Tableau.', 'Experience setting up a Hadoop Cluster environment, administrating including adding and removing cluster nodes, cluster capacity planning and performance tuning. Experience in running Hadoop jobs for processing multiple records of data, monitoring and sizing clusters, developing Hive queries to perform data analysis for large datasets and supporting various Solution Teams providing guidance around data quality and integrity.', 'Networking (1-3 years) - Have a solid understanding of networking capabilities, including load balancers, web application firewalls, network access control lists (NACLs), security groups, routing, tracing, DNS resolution are key to building efficient and stable solutions that prevent business downtime and provide high availability capabilities.', 'Documentation (2-3 years) - Being able to create technical documents that provide insight into the design and implementation of a solution provides teams with the ability to effectively communicate their needs and requirements across the organization. The candidate has to be able to produce clear and concise architecture and design documentation that can assist his team and other peer groups in understanding of the built solutions. The candidate must also be able to communicate complex technical issues with sensitivity to diverse audiences and people with different level of technical understanding that range from entry level support teams, management, and technical engineering resources.', 'Operational Support awareness (5 years) – A good understanding of what it takes to support the deployed applications and solutions is key to providing great service to the end users. ['Big Data ArchitectReporting line:Member of the Global IT Data Management teamHierarchically and operationally reports to the Sr Manager Data ArchitectureKey interactions:Internally:Data Management Services and BI Managers, MDM Manager, IT and Business Application owners, Infrastructure teamsExternally:Contracting firms, Data Management experts.As part of the global IT strategy, The Data Management department is a looking for a Big Data Architect to help build and expand our Data Management architecture landscape, and take responsibility of our project’s architecture.You will be joining the Global IT Management, reporting to the Sr. Manager of Data Architecture. You’ll be interacting internally with Data Management teams, Group Infrastructure teams, BI teams, and the whole IT community. You will participate in various projects and applications steering committees.Your role will be covering the whole data management architecture on various technologies. You will be supporting development teams in their day to day usage of the latest Data Management systems: Horton Works Data Platform and Data Flow platforms, ETL systems, BI tools such as PowerBI and Spotfire.
